txt.en:
'Ta-rum! You are reckless, little one! Can you not tell the difference between Huorns and Black Huorns? Ah, I should not be so hasty. Hoom, perhaps to your eyes, one Huorn looks like any other.

'Black Huorns have emerged from the heart of the forest, but these are wilder than the wildest I have ever seen...they heed not my voice and threaten all who live. Little [placeholder], I have need of your aid. Will you seek out these Black Huorns and put an end to their sorrowful existence?

'Be careful not to harm the Huorns who protect the forest. They are friends, though they be wild.'
Blackthorn is in the eaves of Fangorn, north of Tordag's encampment.\n\nYou should find the Ent who shepherds this part of Fangorn.
Blackthorn the Ent is disturbed by the emergence of Black Huorns from the heart of Fangorn, which do not heed his voice.
Bring the black heartwood you found to Blackthorn in Fangorn
Blackthorn awaits your return in the eaves of Fangorn on the border of the Broadacres.\n\nYou should bring the piece of black heartwood you found to Blackthorn.
Black Huorns may be found throughout the eaves of Fangorn at the edge of the Broadacres.\n\nBlackthorn asked you to put an end to the Black Huorns threatening both the lands of men and the Ents.
Find the Ent who shepherds this part of Fangorn
<rgb=#FF0000>Be careful not to harm the Huorns who serve the Ents ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
Find the Ent who shepherds this part of Fangorn
Having rampaged through the eaves of Fangorn, you should find the Ent who tends this part of the forest and apologize for your indiscretion.
You found a piece of black heartwood upon one of the slain Huorns
'You return so soon? Perhaps the Black Huorns are too much for you....'
'Hoom! This is bad, little [placeholder], bad indeed. This heartwood reeks of corruption of a very evil kind....'
Having rampaged through the eaves of Fangorn, you should find the Ent who tends this part of the forest and apologize for your indiscretion.

'Ta-rum! You are reckless, little one! Can you not tell the difference between Huorns and Black Huorns? Ah, I should not be so hasty. Hoom, perhaps to your eyes, one Huorn looks like any other.

'Black Huorns have emerged from the heart of the forest, but these are wilder than the wildest I have ever seen...they heed not my voice and threaten all who live. Little [placeholder], I have need of your aid. Will you seek out these Black Huorns and put an end to their sorrowful existence?

'Be careful not to harm the Huorns who protect the forest. They are friends, though they be wild.'
